THUMBNAIL-TITLE RELATIONSHIP.How the thumbnail visually reinforces th: The thumbnail directly communicates the video's claim by showing a dramatic facial transformation (before-and-after) with 'REVERSES AGE' written boldly. The scoop of powder and the pointing person suggest a single supplement is responsible, tying into 'The Single Best Supplement To Never Age.'
THUMBNAIL-TITLE RELATIONSHIP.Contrasts or mismatches: There are no obvious mismatches; the thumbnail and title strongly support each other. However, the term 'never age' is slightly contrasted by the text 'reverses age' in the thumbnail, but both communicate dramatic anti-aging promises.
